msbt.message: I want to get to know you better. So I thought maybe I could ask you about some of the things you like.
I'm trying to get to know the community betterThat's why I've been going around asking everyone questions lately.
I've read that the right questions can reveal someone's personality. With that in mind
Here's one thing I'm pretty sure I've asked you about once beforeWhen it comes to , you said you're into .Still true, ?
It actually came up when I was talking to I said, "Speaking of , I know is a fan of ." Then I started doubting my own memory. Glad I knew what I was talking about after all.
I think I remember you liking best out of all Is that still true, ?
It actually came up when I was talking to I told that I thought you were into .Then I wasn't sure, because it'd been a while since you told me thatI should have trusted my instincts.
So, do you remember when we were talking about ?Didn't you tell me how much you like , ?
I was just talking about with I said, "You know is into ."Later I started wondering if that was even still true I'm glad to hear that I wasn't making that up about you.
Remember when we were talking about ? And you said you like ? Is that still true? Are you still a fan of now, ?
I was talking about with the other dayI brought you up as someone who likes .I knew I remembered you saying that.
I asked you one time about what you wanted to be in the future.I remember you told me Is that still your dream, ?
I was talking to about future plansI brought up how you wanted to be .See, I remember what you tell me.
I remember asking you once what you thought you wanted to be in the future, Is still your dream job?
I just told that recently, I said, " is what wants to be."We both agreed that we could see you being great at that, by the way.
Am I remembering this right? Didn't you tell me you were into , ?
I was just telling recently about your thing for .Glad I didn't steer wrong.
You told me once your hobby was Is that still true, ?
Like I said to just recently" is all about ."
You told me once you were great at Is that still your thing, ?
I might have told you were an expert.I said, "If you really want to hear about , go ask ."Later I started questioning myself, and was afraid take my advice and I'd turn out to be wrong.
You told me once you were good at Is that still true, ?
I was talking about local talents with recentlyI said, "Go to with your questions about ."Might have been awkward for both of you if I'd been wrong about that
A little recently told me something, but I thought I should ask you if it's true,
So is it true you're super into ?
I heard right! Now I want to host a fan club so I can hear all your thoughts on
I have to admit, I'm not the most knowledgeable about . That's not to say I'm not interested in learning more, though. I'd love to hear you talk all about !
So is it true you're super into ?
I don't blame you. When it comes to , you can't go wrong with ! Let's get together sometime soon so we can talk in depth.
I'm not the most knowledgeable on the subject of . That isn't to say I'm not interested in learning more though. I'd love to hear your thoughts on !
When you think "," are you really thinking about , ?
Once you start getting into you find out quick how much you have to learn.Take it from me—it's easy to get obsessive about any subject
Sohow obsessive are you about ?Maybe I'm just projecting. I know if I'm really into something, it's on my mind most of the time.
Given your choice of , do you think you'd always pick ?
I sure would. You know it!
There's so much to know about , isn't there?If there's anything I can get, it's wanting to research a subject and learn all there is to know about it.
How well do you know your ? There's a lot to learn. And no one better to teach than a real expert like you!
, do you dream of being someday, ?
Good for you! It's great to have a dream, and even better if you can actually make it come true!I like the sound of it: , the
That's great!<10_4 /> Here's hoping you really do get to be , then!
I can see you becoming the best-ever !You'll be great at it, .
I'm rooting for you to realize your dream!
It's so great that we share a hobby!We definitely need to start a club for fans of !
I'm interested, but I can't say I know a whole lot about .Maybe I should pick up a beginner's guide and learn some of the basics I have a lot of catching up to do!
, would you say is your hobby?
It's neat that we share that hobby!We should get together sometime for some .
I bet is a fun pastime
Do you think of yourself as skilled at ?
I don't share your ability, but I'd love it if you could share what you know about sometime!
It must be great knowing you're so good at !I only wish I had the confidence that comes with skills like yours.
Sure am! Yeah, I guess so.
Feel free to pass along any of your tips for
, huh?I envy anyone with skills I don't have. I'd love to see a demo sometime!
I heard you don't listen to music. Is that true, ?
I guess it is. Yeah, that's true.
Not anymore, it isn't. No, that's changed.
You really don't like to read books at all, ?
Yeah, so what? It's true, I don't.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
I heard you're not into comics at all. Do I have that right, ?
Yeah, what of it? That's right.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
Is it true that you don't like to watch movies, ?
Yeah, so what? It's true, I don't.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
Is it true that you never watch TV, ?
Yeah, so what? It's true, I don't.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
So is it true that you're not really interested in sports, ?
I guess it is. Yeah, that's true.
Not anymore, it isn't. No, that's changed.
Is it true you don't really have a favorite drink, ?
I guess it is. Yeah, that's true.
Not anymore, it isn't. No, that's changed.
Is there really no food you would say was your favorite, ?
I guess there isn't. Yeah, that's true.
No, there is now. I've changed my mind.
Do you really not have any dream for your future, ?
Yeah, so what? It's true, I don't.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
You really don't have any hobbies, ?
Yeah, so what? It's true, I don't.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
You can't think of anything you're particularly skilled at, ?
Yeah, so what? It's true, I can't.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
Well, that's interesting to know. Didn't mean to put you on the spot.
Looks like I heard wrong, then. So sorry about that.
That's not right. Wait a second...
OK, so was right after all.
So you really are all about , then!
So you actually are all about .
So you really do dream of being someday.
So your dream job is still ?
So you are into , after all.
So it is true that you're into !
So it is true that you're good at , then.
So it's true. You really are good at !
So I was right after all. Your first response made me unsure!
What's your favorite kind of music to listen to, ?
Really? So what type of music do you like to listen to now, ?
OK then, What actually is your favorite type of music, ?
I'm so glad! Some folks are snobby about pop music fans. We should compare top-ten lists sometime.
So you like to rock out too! What?! It's what I use to psych myself upTry not to look so surprised. I'm not totally uncool.

Good to find a fellow fan! It has this reputation for being boring, but I get stirred up by a lot of classical music. There are lots of classic pieces with big, exciting moments. But I guess I don't need to tell you that
, huh? So that's what you like.I should give it a listen sometime, and see if I can get into it too.
I see. Well, I guess there's much more to listen to than just musicA babbling brook, chirping crickets, waves lapping the beach
Let's hear it What do you like to read, ?
Interesting! What sort of reading material are you into now, then?
OK, so what kinds of things do you like to read, ?
Oh, me too! I absolutely love novels. I keep picking up more even though I haven't finished all the ones I have.
Aren't cookbooks just the best? Let me know if you ever want to borrow any or trade recipes. I own a few just for the pictures. Everything in a well-produced cookbook looks so scrumptious.
Me too! It's hard to know in advance which ones have the best advice, so I'd appreciate any recommendations.
, huh? That's interesting.I'm always looking for new book recommendations, so thanks!
You're saying there's something out there that's even better than books?Not sure I believe you on that one, but at least I feel like I understand you a little more now, .
Are you into comics? What kind do you like?
Is that right? So what kind of comics are you into lately?
So set me straight. What type of comics do you like, ?

Those are the best kind of stories! Magic swords, sorcery, dragons It's all so romantic and exciting. I think my favorite ones are where someone finds a hidden, fantastic kingdom was right there all along!
Those are amazing when they're done with the right amount of care!I really appreciate seeing and reading art and writing with an attention to historical details.
Those really grab me too! When you know it really happened, it makes the sad parts of a story harder to read.
Really? I should try to find some "" comics for myself
I get it. Not everyone's into comics. Thanks for satisfying my curiosity.
Oh—how about movies? What kind do you like?
Is that right? So what sort of movies are you into now?
So what's your favorite type of movie to watch now?

Oh, I love period pieces too! The costumes are usually the best part of those films.I like to nitpick the details they don't get right or forget about the history.I guess that's kind of a guilty pleasure of mine,

Aren't those just the best?I get so excited seeing my favorite characters exploring these magical worlds full of imaginary creatures It's the next best thing to being able to visit those kingdoms for myself!
Don't you just love a good rom-com? My favorite part is when the future couple "meets cute" early in the film. The more awkward their first meeting, the more I can relate!
? I don't think I've seen many films like thatNow you've made me curious I might see if I can find one like that to watch sometime soon.
So you really aren't into movies? Now I feel like I need to find out what you are interested in!
Do you watch much TV? What type of shows do you like to watch?
Oh no? So what kind of show are you into now, ?
OK, so let's set the record straight. What kind of TV are you into now?
I'm addicted to cooking shows too! I've picked up so many recipes and new kitchen techniques that way. I love that we have this in common!
I like quiz shows too, because they make me feel smart! Really I'm just full of trivia from all the reading I do. I like to yell out answers and then pretend I just won the big jackpot.
Ooh, I'm a documentary fiend myself! If nothing else, they're chock full of great conversation-startering ideas. Someone should film a documentary series all about !
Oh really? So you're a fan of ?Interesting Let me know if you have any suggestions in particular that you think I should watch.
I see. I'm honestly more into reading than watching TV, myselfI feel like I've learned a little something about you here. Thanks for indulging me.
What about sports? Are you into any? Watching or playing, I mean. Do you have a favorite?
Oh no? Then what sport have you gotten into lately, ?
OK, now I'm curious. What sport are you into lately, ?
I love watching swim meets on TV! Swimmers are so graceful. It's really such a beautiful and exciting sport. Hmmm I guess I'm a fan too!
I've never been much good at playing tennis, but matches are fun to watch!I'm impressed by anyone who has the speed and skill to play tennis.
Badminton is fun to play on a beach, even though I'm not much good at it.It's fun to watch too, although it's not an easy sport to find on TV
, huh?I'll need to read up on that one. If you're interested in it, sounds like it's a sport worth knowing about!
So you're not really into sports? I'm mostly just a sports watcher.It doesn't take as much skill or strength to watch from a chair.
What's your favorite drink? I'm really asking you the hard- hitting questions, !
So what's your favorite thing to drink now, ?
OK, so what is your favorite thing to drink these days, ?
I really love the taste of vegetables, so I love the idea of juicing them.There are so many kinds of vegetable combinations you can choose from!
You have great taste! Just the smell of hot cocoa makes me feel happy.Your cocoa drinking must be why you're always happy, !
Sticking to the basics? Good for you! Always a great idea to stay hydrated!I try to remind myself to drink more water throughout the day because it makes me feel better, .
Is that your go-to drink order?Maybe I should give that a try
So you're not choosy at all with beverages. Doesn't that just mean you're easy to please, ? I kind of want to get you to try all kinds of different drinks now, so I can hear your impressions of them.
What's your favorite food? I know it's kind of a corny question, but cooking is my thing, .
So what's your new favorite thing to eat, ?
OK, then let's hear your new answer. What's your current favorite food?

Making pizza is so much fun! Kneading dough, tossing it up in the air and stretching it out Every pizza that I bake is a new experiment in topping combinations. So many possibilities, ! It's one of my very favorite things to make, so I'm glad to hear that it's your new favorite thing to eat!
I love making salads because you almost can't go wrong with your choice of ingredients, . Veggies, fruit, pasta, gelatin You're only limited by imagination!
You know, my dad says he knows the best apple pie recipe, I should call his bluff and get him to send it to me, so I can find out what you think as an apple pie expert!
, huh?Do you have a favorite recipe for that, and are you willing to share?
So does that mean you're fine with eating just about anything?Maybe I should recruit you to be the go-to taste tester for all of my future recipe experiments,
Now you've really got my attention. What's your new dream occupation?
OK then, let's hear it. What job do you dream of achieving someday?

I love that so much! Was there a teacher that inspired you to want to do the same work someday? It would be incredible to find out that you'd made that kind of life-changing impression on a student, wouldn't it?

Really? That'd be amazing! Comics are a great way to put big ideas out into the world. I used to create my own comics and shelve them in the school library for other students to find and read I was proud of my work then, but it's kind of embarrassing to look back on now. My art skills were pretty rough.
So you'd like to be part of a team working on a big project together?It is rewarding to be part of a team, helping each other to accomplish something you couldn't do alone.
, huh?Sure, I could see that being a good fit for you. Now get out there and make it happen, !
It's probably a good idea to stay open-minded about your future.I never dreamed of helping to settle a deserted island, but here we are.
So what do you like to do with your free time, ?
You've got a new hobby? So what is it, then?
Tell me what your hobby is, then.
I just knew you had to be an avid reader like me!Any time you want to trade book recommendations, I'm all ears!
So you're a dedicated tourist, huh? I'll have to get recommendations from you for good destinations. There must be all kinds of amazing places out there I don't know about.
You like doing arts and crafts too? It's so great to find a fellow artisan!I'd love to see some of your work, if you ever feel like sharing
If it's something that interests you, then I can't help but get curious about .
Oh. Well, if you do pick up a hobby at some point, I'd like to hear about it.
What would you say your secret talent is?
You've picked up a new skill? Good for you What is it?
Set me straight, then. What's a special skill of yours?
You can tell fortunes? I'm intrigued. I'd love to see a demonstration some time if you're up to it, . Wait, did you know I would say that?
You like to cook too? Oh wow! We should share our recipes. And kitchen appliances. And spices! Sorry, I get carried away when it comes to certain subjects
You can speak other languages? Good for you! That's so admirable.I'm ashamed to admit that this is the only language I'm fluent in.
?I'd love a demonstration sometime, if you ever feel like showing off.
Aw, I'm sure you do have something that you're great at. Maybe you just haven't realized it yet, . Just let me know as soon as you do.
